name: Away From Earth: Titan
detailed_description:
Away From Earth: Titan

StoryLine


Our world is in danger. Our water is finishing...Oil was finished as already. Currently, as a astronaut we've a mission...Going to Titan and making there as liveable. As player, you'll be astronaut and your mission will be creating a ecosystem on titan and bringing people from world to titan.

GamePlay


First you need to start with looting materials. Then by using these materials, you can start creating your colony. You'll need to use your engineer abilities to create the ecosystem of Titan. Then you'll be able to bring people from World to Titan.

Features


  • Level One Colony House: Needs low electric and water. It can handle only one person.
  • Level Two Colony House: Needs medium electric and water. It can handle three people.
  • Level Three Colony House: Needs high electric and water. It can handle five people.
  • Discovery Car: It has been made for low gravity of Titan. You can explain titan with that and loot materials as faster.
  • Flyable Discovery Ship: It can fly and make you play the game faster.
  • R.C Item Looter: With this vehicle, you can loot materials without having oxygen problem.
  • Electric Engine for electric generation and a water engine for water needs.
  • Use your engineer abilites to make water pipe and electric cable connects.
  • Use Lazer Item Looter gun to loot materials.
  • Use destroyer gun to destroy what you've builded.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 10 32 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
